Kesinlikle zamanin otesinde vir oyundu. Ozellikle birinci oyunun ustune kattigi yenilikler ve hikayenin devami cok hos olmus. Ayrica arkadasinizla hos vakit gecirebileceginiz de coop bolumleri eklemisler. 
Bu oyuna puanim:
Grafikler 10/8
Ana Hikaye 10/9
Coop Hikaye 10/7
Mekanikler 10/8
Akicilik 10/9
Mekan Tasarimlari 10/9 
Genel olarak ortalama puanim 8.5
Oyuna gonul rahatligiyla bu parayi verebilirsiniz.

Even a decade after release, it's still amazing. The puzzles, the world-building, the stories. No need to rehash the memes of the first game. It tells great stories without needing on-screen NPCs, and can even makes the Player feel sympathy for a potato.

I truely recommend Portal 2. Why do I do that?

Well, first and most obviously: Portal itself is a wonderful puzzle game, with awesome graphics and one of the best video-game-stories I've come across so far, really gettin you into the characters and the world they're in. Portal 2 just takes all of that and adds a grand sequel to it, which isn't just great to play alone, but acutally CO-OPs you, though yet ANOTHER breathtaking story.

Secondly: Cuz the cake really is a lie.

Die Story kann es meiner Meinung nach zwar nicht mit dem 1. Teil aufnehmen, Portal 2 ist jedoch trotzdem ein gut gelungenes Spiel. Die Geschichte ist erneut recht unterhaltsam und auch etwas länger, als im vorherigen Teil.
Zudem besitzt das Spiel einen Multiplayer Modus, in welchem man zu zweit recht viele Rätsel lösen kann.

Kann das Spiel nur empfehlen, da es im Sale auch weniger als 2€ kostet, welche es auf alle Fälle wert ist.

Even though this game is almost 8 years old, this still has to be one of the best Co-op games that I have ever played and still play to this day.

The game follows suit on the puzzle-solving fun of the original, with double the charm and challenge, whilst introducing a co-op mode that sadly is long abandoned. The single player portion is still very much relevant and should feel as entertaining as the first one.

Un imprescindible en tu biblioteca de steam. Uno de los mejores juegos de puzzles y plataformas, mejor que el primero si cabe, una auténtica joya y una pasada jugarlo.

Probably the best campaign I ever played. The stroy lines up with Portal very well. 
I love every aspect of this game. 
The style, story, characters, physics, textures, the plot twists...
If you hadn't played it yet, make sure to play Portal  first since you than actually get the references to previous events and so on.

Multiplayer/co-op is also great, I love the little tutorial in the beginning of each session. 

The complexity of levels sure can keep you busy for a little while. Things aren't really repetitive so you won't just get sick of it.

The game in general isn't that resource heavy so it should work on lower-end computers, but don't expect 60Fps on a Radeon HD5450 or Intel's HD 3000.

The story should take you about 8-12hours.

Truly worth your time and money.

Спите спокойно, мои маленькие машины для убийц!
